Introduction

Riwon is a South Korean singer, dancer, and actress signed under M25. She made her acting debut on August 9, 2019, in the Tooniverse web drama My YouTube Diary.

On September 14, 2021, Riwon was introduced as a contestant on MBC's survival show My Teenage Girl. During the finale, she placed fifth with 209,053.9 votes, securing her position as a member of the girl group CLASS:y. CLASS:y debuted on May 5, 2022, with the release of their mini-album "Class Is Over".
